title: Heavily pregnant Marnie Simpson is overdue by eight days and she's really suffering
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Heavily pregnant Marnie Simpson is now eight days overdue.

The former Geordie Shore star's due date was over a week ago and she is growing tired of waiting for her bundle of joy's late arrival.

On Thursday, Marnie, 27, continued to keep her fans updated with her pregnancy journey as she shared a candid Instagram story.

In an honest clip, an uncomfortable-looking Marnie looked obviously nervously awaiting her baby as she displayed her huge expectant stomach.

(Image: Instagram)

She captioned the footage for her 3.5 million followers: "Look how big my bump is guys.

"I'm 8 days overdue and really badly suffering. Wanna keep you all updated as much as possible but struggling to even talk.

"Sorry I've been a little inactive it's just I'm so uncomfortable now."

The reality TV babe then thanked her fans for their "constant support" and promised to let them know when "little one has made his arrival".

(Image: Instagram)

Just days ago, Marnie told her followers how she has been struggling to sleep since her baby boy is overdue by a week.

The pregnant star admitted she had the most "restless night sleep ever" and was still waiting.

She is due any minute to give birth to her baby boy, with boyfriend Casey Johnson.

(Image: @marns/Instagram)

She even has her hospital bag packed ready to go when the time comes.

The brunette babe previously confessed she was so excited to finally become a family with beau Casey.

Casey appeared on X Factor in the boy band Stereo Kicks and he was also a member of Union J.

The pair reunited on MTV's Ex On The Beach and they have had an on/off relationship historically, which appeared to have been solved since Marnie's blossoming pregnancy announcement.

(Image: Instagram)

She recently wrote on Instagram: "I’m so happy me and Casey get to experience this together

"It’s gonna be so intense, my mind can’t cope with the Emotions it’s so overwhelming Im so full of love i could burst!!!!

"Roll on the next 7 days baby boy mammy and daddy are ready & waiting the count down is ONNNN!!! "
description: Former Geordie Shore star Marnie is "really suffering" as she waits for her bundle of joy to arrive
